TopicTitle: Can't Complete 2nd Mission --- Key Binding Issue? (Roll, Pitch, Yaw)

Articles.Content: The crewed spacecraft is on the launch pad.  As I understand tutorials, I must make the spacecraft move in order to complete the second mission, and that is achieved through taps on the pitch, yaw, and roll commands.  The problem is that my WASDQE taps move the indicators in the lower left of the screen, but the spacecraft itself doesn't respond.  I must be overlooking something simple...(I hope)?
